mapper.select: select i.content_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.addr2, i.latitude, i.longitude,i.readcount, i.first_image, i.sido_code, d.overview from attraction_info i left join attraction_description d on i.content_id = d.content_id where i.content_id= #{attractionId};

choose.when: SELECT s.sido_code, s.sido_name, g.gugun_code, g.gugun_name FROM sido s LEFT JOIN gugun g ON s.sido_code = g.sido_code WHERE s.sido_code > 10 and (g.gugun_name LIKE "%시" OR g.gugun_name LIKE "%군")
choose.otherwise: SELECT g.sido_code, sido.sido_name, IF(sido.sido_code < 10, sido.sido_code, g.gugun_code) AS gugun_code, IF(sido.sido_code < 10, sido.sido_name, g.gugun_name) AS gugun_name FROM sido LEFT JOIN gugun g ON sido.sido_code = g.sido_code WHERE sido.sido_name LIKE '%${word}%' OR g.gugun_name LIKE '%${word}%' GROUP BY sido.sido_code, sido.sido_name, IF(sido.sido_code < 10, sido.sido_code, g.gugun_code), IF(sido.sido_code < 10, sido.sido_name, g.gugun_name)
